The number of database queries has been improved with #1014, which is deployed on prod now. Things still seem sluggish to me, so I think we should move forward with the frontend performance ideas @andymikulski had.

body_html:
Last time I looked into this our API views were pretty inefficient in how they query the database, in some cases ending up with hundreds of unnecessary database queries.

The number of database queries has been improved with #1014, which is deployed on prod now. Things still seem sluggish to me, so I think we should move forward with the frontend performance ideas @andymikulski had.
